videos.title: Saffron Olive plays The Salt Game  CovertGoPodcast
videos.description:
For this episode of The Salt Game, Seth, probably better known as Saffron Olive, is joining us. Find his content @MTGGoldfish

Shoutout to @thehowlingsaltmine for the concept, shoutout to Davis Patterson for the sweet web app https://saltquiz.netlify.app/
